channel.title: I wonder...any 317's with old graphical interface?
channel.description: Hmm...Lately, when I see people saying that they have a 317 client, they do not have a 317 graphical interface. For some reason, its a 508 graphical interface. Is there anyone around moparscape right now who does not use a 508 graphical interface, and uses a 317 interface when they say the client is 317? I am just curious... ;D Because this seems to not exist on moparscape ATM :| Peace! :P

item.title: I wonder...any 317's with old graphical interface?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

OS Remake used 317 client I’m pretty sure. And I’m using it on my lil project. CBA to post a development thread til I actually get something together.

Read full topic

item.title: I wonder...any 317's with old graphical interface?

item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Ugly? If it was the whole original RS client with everything the way it should be, then wouldn’t you would code it to not be as ugly? Too bad you did not still have it, I could of asked if I could have it or not =P

item.title: I wonder...any 317's with old graphical interface?
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:372303”][quote author=mopar fan link=topic=468361.msg3425106#msg3425106 date=1291851902]

http://uppit.com/v/GRYCAMNO

[/quote]

Really?

NPC,s ITems and shops are handled server sided you stupid nub :P[/quote]

…Yes…am…such stupid…nub…makes me feel…tingly…inside…mmm…
XD anyways, I am talking about a download wise, when you download , I wonder if there is a such download that has the original rs client, and every other file that was original with it as well that would after you download it, it would be an exact duplicate of RS when it was still 317.

Read full topic
item.source: I wonder...any 317's with old graphical interface?

item.title: I wonder...any 317's with old graphical interface?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“mopar fan, post:8, topic:372302”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=468361.msg3424149#msg3424149 date=1291771510]
http://uppit.com/v/GRYCAMNO
[/quote]

Wow, is that the whole original whole rs client with everything included where it should be ( like npc’s/ items in shops, quests, music…)? Or is this a piece of work someone did to look like original one? I wonder if the original rs 317 client with everything where it should be is really out there if it isn’t.
…It would be interesting to know…[/quote]
It’s moparisthebest’s renamed deob, with all dummies (unused/useless method parameters) removed.

Read full topic
